ice.name: 冰之幻境
ice.description: 在冰雪之境中展现你的个性
ice.location_prompt: 冰雪世界，晶莹剔透的冰宫殿，寒冷而美丽的雪景

style_prompts.水晶风格: crystal style, ice crystal, transparent, shiny, ethereal, reflective surface
style_prompts.冰霜魔法: ice magic, snowflake particles, frost effect, magical, enchanted, mystical aura
style_prompts.北欧神话: Norse mythology, Viking aesthetic, runes, ancient winter gods, ethereal beauty
style_prompts.童话冰雪: winter fairy tale, snow queen, magical ice kingdom, fantasy, dreamy landscape
style_prompts.现代冰雕: modern ice sculpture, minimalist ice architecture, geometric ice forms, blue tint
style_prompts.极光幻境: aurora borealis, northern lights, magical night sky, ethereal glow, dreamlike
style_prompts.雪山探险: snow mountain adventure, alpine landscape, crisp winter air, vast snow peaks

fire.name: 火之领域
fire.description: 在火焰的世界中展现你的力量
fire.location_prompt: 火山世界，熔岩城堡，炙热而壮丽的焰景

style_prompts.熔岩风格: lava style, molten rock, glowing embers, heat waves, fiery aesthetic
style_prompts.烈焰魔法: fire magic, flame particles, burning effect, magical, enchanted, mystical aura
style_prompts.东方朱雀: oriental vermilion bird, phoenix, ancient fire deity, chinese mythological creature
style_prompts.神话火神: fire deity, mythological fire god, ancient flame spirits, godly power
style_prompts.现代炼金: modern alchemy, fire laboratory, scientific mysticism, controlled flames
style_prompts.火焰艺术: fire art, flame painting, artistic fire patterns, creative heat imagery
style_prompts.火山探险: volcano adventure, lava landscape, heat rising, dramatic fire scenery
